content: > please note this graph is free to > view in its entirety on my blog this > ad-free downloadable pdf enables me to > be able to bring you more free > patterns in the future go to the free pattern here 2 **description ** do you love a fun play of color half_double_crochet stitches and energetic fringe because the color swirl blanket may be exactly what you re looking for this pattern is worked in back and forth row of half_double_crochet from the bottom up the color coded instructions and graph example make following along surprisingly easy especially when you fall into the rhythm of the design and the fringe is as always optional but it does add some extra movement and excitement to the finished blanket get comfortable and relax with this breezy project that will add a bit of snuggly retro style to any room this pattern features both the graph and color coded written instructions for ease of following the pattern on my blog only features the graph 3 the sample for this blanket was made with 4 colors of pound of love by lion brand yarn 4 affiliate link check out the kit from lion brand yarn here 5 affiliate link you may sell all finished products made from this pattern however you may not share sell or distribute this pattern in any way in whole or in part i would greatly appreciate a link back to my shop or this pattern anytime you sell this item online gauge listed in pattern written in us crochet terms you may not use any of the photos from this listing or the ones contained in the pattern to sell your item you must take your own photos do not create a pattern based on my pattern copyright @ divine debris 2025 no part of this document may be reproduced or transmitted in any form by any means electronic mechanical photocopying or otherwise without prior written permission from the author sales of finished product are permitted but designer requests that you link back to pattern and credit divine debris with the original design under the
